tuit: In 2021, our @NASAPersevere Mars rover landed and our Ingenuity helicopter took flight Two asteroid missions launched to the skies, and another began its journey home to EarthA look back at highlights for our #NASAScience planetary missions: https://go.nasa.gov/32zX2fE

@SpaceX Dragon spacecraft returns to Earth with @ISS_Research that could help us better understand neurodegenerative diseases, gene expression, & muscle atrophy. Undocking from the @Space_Station is at 9:05am ET (13:05 UT). Watch:
